name: QuizChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open quiz challenge”
”Alexa, start quiz challenge”
”Alexa, launch quiz challenge”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
“Quiz Challenge” is an Alexa skill game designed to test your general knowledge with quiz challenges.
Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.
The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
